name: Sorry, My Dice
description:
Sorry, My Dice

"The riskiest thing for a dice is to become a better dice" - Programmer thought when he is 6 hours into the game jam and cannot think of any theme yet

A game about a dice father going to apologize to his family for being involve into gambling. Listen to criticism to utmost level and just simply say sorry.

"Roll of the dice - a risky attempt to do or achieve something" - First Result from Google Chrome Tab

Synopsis: Dice's father has been rolling deep into gambling debt that it destroyed his family. It is now up to him to risk himself to build back his family. He doesn't know whether it will it achieve anything but it is up to him to apologize to his family for his deed. Although, we couldn't make any D26 dice in time within 48 hours. Typing is still an option where he has to apologize to them and achieve a happy dice family again!

Made within 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam

Control:

  • Keyboard 
  • Use Arrow Keys to move around to avoid the enemies
  • Type word using keyboard to destroy the enemies
  • Spacebar / Mouse Click to select option

Credits:

  • Leo: Art
  • Royalty Free Music from youtube.com as only known source of music for him
